title: Player Compatibility Test
description: Take the test to determine your gaming style and compatibility with other players

questions.question1: How do you react to losing?
questions.question3: How often do you communicate in voice chat?
questions.question4: How do you treat teammates' mistakes?
questions.question5: How do you learn in games?
questions.question6: What role do you prefer in a team?
questions.question7: How long can you play without a break?
questions.question8: How do you react to toxic players?
questions.question9: How do you feel about strategic gameplay?
questions.question10: How do you behave in critical situations?
questions.question11: How do you treat newcomers in the team?
questions.question12: How do you choose your hero/class?
questions.question13: What do you do after several consecutive defeats?
questions.question14: How do you play with strangers?
questions.question15: How do you react to playing against stronger opponents?
questions.question16: How do you feel about cheaters?
questions.question17: How do you behave in arguments with the team?
questions.question19: What's more important to you in the game?
questions.question20: How often do you get distracted during the game?

question1: Get angry and blame the team
question17: Might flare up but cool down

tooltips.toxicity: Players who are rude, insulting, or intentionally disrupting gameplay
tooltips.strategy: When team plans tactics in advance and strictly follows them
tooltips.critical: Difficult, tense moments (e.g., when team is losing or outnumbered)
tooltips.strangers: Random players in your team (not friends)
tooltips.sensitivity: How strongly you emotionally react to criticism, trolling or failures
tooltips.hero_selection: Choosing character/class based on team composition vs personal preference
